meanings.definition: Relating to or composed of aragonite.
meanings.sent1: The aragonitic shell of the snail was shiny and smooth.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the aragonitic composition of the rock.
meanings.sent3: The aragonitic crystals sparkled like tiny diamonds under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes gleamed with an aragonitic brilliance, reflecting her excitement.
meanings.sent5: The aragonitic structure of the coral reef was breathtakingly beautiful.

meanings.sent1: The aragonitic mineral deposits in the cave were stunning.
meanings.sent2: The jewelry was made of aragonitic gemstones that shimmered in the light.
meanings.sent3: The aragonitic content of the soil made the plants grow faster than usual.
meanings.sent4: The aragonitic layers of the fossil revealed its ancient origins.
meanings.sent5: The aragonitic nature of the seashells made them fragile but beautiful.
